document_data.caption: A map showing Niles Way and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Niles Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Niles Way''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Niles Way was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. The road originated on [[Snail Street]], branching west from its north section where it ended on [[Hillock Court]] near [[Castle Waterdeep]]. Niles Way also connected with [[Watchmen's Way]] and [[Guards Court]].
